about.title: About Me
about.bio: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating efficient and scalable solutions. Specialized in .NET, React and modern architectures.
about.intro: My focus is on writing clean, maintainable and scalable code, applying industry best practices such as Clean Architecture and CQRS.
about.passion: I'm passionate about learning new technologies and applying them in real projects that generate value. From modern web applications to robust backend systems, I enjoy every stage of development.
about.approach: I work on both freelance and personal projects, always seeking to exceed client expectations and deliver high-quality solutions that truly solve problems.
